House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08316
FULL TITLE : AN ACT GRANTING RETIREMENT BENEFITS TO ALL BARANGAY OFFICIALS WHO HAVE RENDERED AT LEAST 3 (THREE) TERMS OF CONTINUOUS SERVICE AND PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Grants lump sum retirement benefits to elected barangay officials equivalent to one and a half (1 ½ ) month of his/her last honorium for every year of service which shall be taken form the Barangay Retirement Fund. Prohibits barangay officials who were convicted of a crime or have pending criminal or administrative cases filed against them from availing the said retirement benefits.
ALIAS NAME : “Barangay Officials Retirement Benefits Act.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CALIXTO-RUBIANO, EMI G.
